prompt.title: JavaScript Tutor Prompt: Set an assignment
prompt.context: I want to practice what I have learned about [TOPIC] in JavaScript. Please give me two short, hands-on exercises that I can complete directly in a web browser.
prompt.instructions: 1. Each exercise should be practical and beginner-friendly. 2. The tasks must run in a browser using tags or the browser console. 3. Avoid Node.js or server-side examples. 4. Encourage me to think, not just copy and paste. 5. Do not give the answers yet.
